PF2E_VISION_CONFIG.MODULE_DESCRIPTION: Adds configurable vision options for tokens including daylight vision distance in feet and miles.
PF2E_VISION_CONFIG.DAYLIGHT_VISION_FEET_HINT: Distance in feet that the token can see during daylight conditions
PF2E_VISION_CONFIG.DAYLIGHT_VISION_MILES_HINT: Distance in miles that the token can see during daylight conditions
PF2E_VISION_CONFIG.VISION_TYPE_HINT: Type of vision the token possesses

SETTINGS.TITLE: PF2E Vision Configuration Settings
SETTINGS.DEFAULT_DAYLIGHT_FEET_HINT: Default daylight vision distance in feet for new tokens
SETTINGS.DEFAULT_DAYLIGHT_MILES_HINT: Default daylight vision distance in miles for new tokens
SETTINGS.DEFAULT_VISION_TYPE_HINT: Default vision type for new tokens

PF2E_VISION_CONFIG.TOTAL_VISION_RANGE_HINT: Calculated total vision range (feet + miles converted to feet)
